thread.title: This hotel and staff are amazing
thread.title_full: This hotel and staff are amazing - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: barpokerpros
title: This hotel and staff are amazing
text: I don't get the negative stuff people post on here. From Desiree Rosario who couldn't have made our trip any better, to the from desk to the bag handlers to the room attendants, this hotel is on point. I never had a single issue with anything or anyone here. I refuse to stay anywhere else now and i cannot wait to go back. Do yourself a favor and skip the negative reviews.They aren't worth your effort when it comes to the amazing staff at the Paramount. We'll be back for a high corner room the next time. Cant wait.
